means: 形容词（英国）不信奉英国国教的

sentence.Network_en: His father was a Nonconformist minister.
Major's elders disliked him because he was such a flagrant nonconformist.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅杰的长辈不喜欢他,因为他这样公开地违反了他们心目中的生活准则.

sentence.Network_en: Two college dropouts with mysterious means of income and nonconformist lifestyles.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个大学退学生,有着神秘的收入,过着被世人所不屑的生活.

英语词汇记... ... compulsory a. 义务的;强制的;必修的 nonconformist n. 不墨守成规的人 conscientious a. 认真的;凭良心做的.

list.abs: Comedy is the last refuge of the nonconformist mind ., 喜剧是不循规蹈矩者最后的避难所.
The rarity bias also sometimes called a " nonconformist bias " ., 罕见稀有偏好有时也被称为 " 非从众偏好 ".

but , behind this facade hides a secret organization , that has for goal to protect the italian state of the " republicans " , a nonconformist terrorist cell .但是，这个门面背后隐藏的秘密组织，这为目标，以保护意大利国家的“共和党”的异己分子。

entry.tran: 不墨守成规的;不遵循主流思想的
entry.def: If you say that someone's way of life or opinions are nonconformist, you mean that they are different from those of most people.

example.ex: Their views are non-conformist and their political opinions are extreme...
example.tran: 他们的看法与众不同，政治见解也很极端。

example.ex: Your non-conformist ways will probably get you into trouble.
example.tran: 你特立独行的行事方式可能会给自己惹来麻烦。

entry.tran: (英国)不信奉英国国教的，不遵奉圣公会的
entry.def: In Britain, nonconformist churches are Protestant churches which are not part of the Church of England.

example.ex: His father was a Nonconformist minister.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who refuses to conform to established standards of conduct
1. not conforming to some norm or socially approved pattern of behavior or thought;

sentences.sentence: "their rabidly nonformist deportment has made them legendary"
"the old stubborn nonconformist spirit of the early settlers"

means.word_mean: 2. not conforming to established customs or doctrines especially in religion

auth_sentence.content: Voltairean, Woolf a rabbi, myself a nonconformist .

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Voltairean, Woolf a rabbi, myself a nonconformist .

auth_sentence.content: Gandhi's nonconformist ways tend to appall and alienate secular-minded observers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gandhi's nonconformist ways tend to appall and alienate secular-minded observers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gandhi's nonconformist ways tend to appall and alienate secular-minded observers.

auth_sentence.content: Except that this summer there will be nothing nonconformist about wearing flats.
auth_sentence.res_content: Except that this summer there will be nothing nonconformist about wearing flats.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Except that this summer there will be nothing nonconformist about wearing flats.

stems_affixes.word_buile: non不,非+committal委托,承担义务→不忠诚的→暧昧的
non不,非+descript描述→不能描述特征的
non不,非+conductor导体→n.不传导体, 绝缘体
non不,非+conform一致+ist人→[和传统]不一致的人
non不,非+entity存在物→不是存在物→不重要的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 受到排挤的人, 微不足道的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: non不,非+person人→n.受到排挤的人, 微不足道的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无与伦比的事物, 绝品, 极品
stems_affixes.word_buile: non不,非+such这样的人或物→无匹敌的人
non不,非+plus加→[连]加法都不知道

sentences.en: Nonconformists retained a deep distrust of their Anglican neighbours.
sentences.cn: 非英国国教者一直不信任圣公会的人。
